prop.head.headtext: Claims for Breach of Confidential Business Information

head.headtext: Types of Fiduciary Duties Owed—Joint Ventures

para.paratext: There is a duty on the parties of a joint venture to act in good faith and there may be a breach of fiduciary duty where one party gathers information under the guise of negotiations.[1]
Sweet Factory Inc. v. Hudson's Bay Co. (1998), 47 B.L.R. (2d) 237, 85 C.P.R. (3d) 417 (Ont. Ct. (Gen. Div.)).
